resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81232</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81232</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9272</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quiz: Revise Fourth Class Reader Blue Skies.</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario: Revisión de la lectura de la clase cuarta Blue Skies.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist: Dul siar ar Blue Skies – Léitheoir Ranga do rang a ceathar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz: Verbessern Sie Vierter Kategorie 
Leser-Blaue Himmel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu : Mettez à jour Les Cieux Bleus du 
Quatrième Lecteur de Classe.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz: Revise Céus Azuis Do Quarto Leitor 
Da Classe.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz: Cieli Blu Del Lettore Del Codice 
categoria Di Quarto Della Revisione.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων: Αναθεωρήστε τους μπλε 
ουρανούς τέταρτων αναγνωστών κλάσης.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will be enabled to test their knowledge on some of the stories read during the year in the class reader.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos podrán comprobar su conocimiento sobre algunos de los cuentos leídos durante el año en la clase de lectura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cuirfear ar chumas na ndaltaí a n-eolas ar roinnt de na scéalta a léigh siad I rith na bliana sa léitheoir ranga a thástáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen werden aktiviert, ihr Wissen auf einigen der 
Geschichten zu prüfen, die während des Jahres im Kategorie Leser 
gelesen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des pupilles seront permises de tester leur connaissance 
sur certaines des histoires lues pendant l'année dans le lecteur de 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas serão permitidas de testar seu conhecimento em
algumas das histórias lidas durante o ano no leitor da classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille saranno permesse di verificare la loro 
conoscenza su alcune delle storia colte durante l'anno nel lettore del
codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα επιτραπούν για να εξετάσουν τη γνώση 
τους σχετικά με μερικές από τις ιστορίες που διαβάζονται κατά τη
διάρκεια του έτους στον αναγνώστη κλάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

            <entry>9272</entry>
          </identifier>

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)

END:VCARD</entity>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
